mapper.select: select ap.application_seq as applicationSeq , ap.application_name as applicationName , ap.application_description as applicationDescription , ap.idq as idq , ap.codiceq as codiceq , ap.display_order as displayOrder , fl.files_seq as filesSeq , fl.filename as filename from tb_applications ap left outer join tb_files fl on fl.linked_table = 'tb_applications' and fl.linked_seq = ap.application_seq and fl.file_type = '00' and fl.file_usage = '000' where 1=1 and ap.use_yn = 'Y' order by ap.display_order asc, ap.application_name asc, ap.updated_date desc
